article_node.title: mVISE AG's (ETR:C1V) Path To Profitability
article_node.summary: mVISE AG, a German IT consultancy, posted a €4 million loss in 2024 and is projected to break even in 2026, requiring an aggressive 113 % year‑on‑year revenue growth. The company’s debt‑to‑equity ratio of 107 % signals high leverage, while analysts see a modest €400 k profit in 2026 if growth targets are met. Market sentiment is bearish, with the stock trading well below its estimated fair value of €1.6, reflecting concerns over profitability and capital structure.
